summary: in other news I continue to feel very alone in being That One Caleb Fan who absolutely 100% wants him to fuck with time, fuck up...
body: in other news I continue to feel very alone in being That One Caleb Fan who absolutely 100% wants him to fuck with time, fuck up time completely. all u sweethearts are like “when will he start prioritizing the M9 over his Dangerous Goals? when will he abandon the time travel idea and Heal?” meanwhile I’m chanting TIME TRAVEL TIME TRAVEL TIME TRAVEL. GO OFF CALEB FUCK THE RAVEN QUEEN FUCK EVERYTHING. TIME TRAVEL!!!!!!

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.

summary: I’ve got *harp music* Laura Bailey on the brain and I can’t stop thinking about how much Jester and Tohru have in common. Loves...
body:
I’ve got *harp music* Laura Bailey on the brain and I can’t stop thinking about how much Jester and Tohru have in common. Loves her mom SO MUCH but also has some messy feelings and complicated mom-related trauma! Huge sweetheart who almost everybody loves and would kill for! Very supportive of friends, loads of compliments especially for those low self esteem friends! Really loves all these weird magical animals she’s adopted into her life!

And because AUs are fun to think about, Tohru could make a good cleric (light domain, maybe?) but lets be real, she’d probably be a peasant in D&D world. Proficiency in animal handling, high wisdom/low intelligence, has a cooking set and can swing her bag at people for 1D4 bludgeoning damage.

Jester in the Fruits Basket world would terrorize the Sohma clan. She’s gonna hug everybody so she can see the cute animals and nobody can stop her. Erase her memories? Just try it, fucker. Meets Akito and uses Hellish Rebuke. Convinces at least half the kids to run away with her for a life of freedom and chaos, but not before vandalizing the Sohma family compound with paintings of dicks everywhere.

summary: I will always suggest getting the Tal'Dorei campaign guide because you learn so much about the world Matt has created and it...
body: I will always suggest getting the Tal'Dorei campaign guide because you learn so much about the world Matt has created and it gives you a leg-up when he mentions something and you’re like HOLY SHIT IMPORTANT PLACE/EVENT/GOD/CLUE! Like with Ghor Dranas. Being an avid visitor of the CR fandom/wikia is also helpful but that campaign guide is 👌.

reblog.comment: I will always suggest getting the Tal'Dorei campaign guide because you learn so much about the world Matt has created and it gives you a leg-up when he mentions something and you’re like HOLY SHIT IMPORTANT PLACE/EVENT/GOD/CLUE! summary: I've always wondered how Caleb's plans to go back in time and change what happened with his parents are gonna be affected by his...
body: I’ve always wondered how Caleb’s plans to go back in time and change what happened with his parents are gonna be affected by his growing to love the M9. Especially because Nott wants him to be able to change her once he is powerful enough but if he goes back in time and changes things, he probably won’t ever meet Nott or the rest of the party, so not only will Nott not be changed, her husband might well die without the M9 coming to rescue him. (He still might die anyway, but he certainly has a better shot at surviving with the group coming to save him than without.) There are also countless other things he could change by fucking with time. And now Matt has put that out there as more of a possibility with dunamancy and my brain is screaming with all these questions. Also what would the group (particularly Nott) say if they found out?? That he would just do it and consequences be damned? Because Liam said Caleb would for sure go back in time given the chance.
